Uses of Class
org.apache.river.api.security.PermissionGrantBuilder

  • Packages that use PermissionGrantBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.apache.river.api.security
    This package contains a scalable cache based security manager that parallelises domain security checks.

    • Uses of PermissionGrantBuilder in org.apache.river.api.security

      Subclasses of PermissionGrantBuilder in org.apache.river.api.security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  PermissionGrantBuilderImp
      PermissionGrantBuilderImp represents the serialized form of all PermissionGrant implementations in this package.
      Methods in org.apache.river.api.security that return PermissionGrantBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.certificates(Certificate[] certs) 
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.certificates(Certificate[] certs)
      Sets the Certificate[] a CodeSource must have to receive the PermissionGrant.

      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.clazz(Class cl)
      Extracts ProtectionDomain from the Class for use in the PermissionGrantBuilder.
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.context(int context) 
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.context(int context)
      Sets the context of the PermissionGrant to on of the static final fields in this class.

      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.permissions(Permission[] perm)
      Specifies Permission's to be granted.
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.principals(Principal[] pals) 
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.principals(Principal[] pals)
      Sets the Principal[] that a Subject must have to be entitled to receive the PermissionGrant.
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.reset()
      Resets builder back to initial state, ready to receive new information for building a new PermissionGrant.
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.reset()
      resets the state for reuse, identical to a newly created PermissionGrantBuilder, this step must be performed to avoid unintentional grants to previously added URI.
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.setDomain(WeakReference<ProtectionDomain> pd) 
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.setDomain(WeakReference<ProtectionDomain> domain) 
      PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilderImp.uri(String path) 
      abstract PermissionGrantBuilder PermissionGrantBuilder.uri(String path)
      The URI will be added to the PermissionGrant, multiple may be specified by calling multiple times.
